documents-not-received-start.header: Report that you have not received your documents

report-submitted.p1: We have sent email confirmation to {{values.dnr-email}}.
report-submitted.p2: If you need your documents for travel, do not book tickets until you have them back.
report-submitted.p3: The Home Office may contact you by email or telephone if they need more information.
report-submitted.p4: They will not reply if it has been less than 10 working days (Monday to Friday) since you asked for your documents back.

documents-not-received-further-leave.header: Further leave to remain (permission to stay)
documents-not-received-further-leave.p1: There are different categories of further leave to remain (also called permission to stay), depending on your circumstances.
documents-not-received-further-leave.link-read-more: Read more about the types of further leave
documents-not-received-further-leave.p2: to check which one you applied for.
documents-not-received-further-leave.p3: You will have used an online form called 'FLR' to apply. You will have applied from inside the UK.
